name: Solitaire Classic - Card Games
description:
Also known as Klondike Solitaire and Patience, Solitaire is the #1 card game app on the store! With high quality crisp graphics and simple gameplay this is the best and most addictive version of Solitaire yet!

Popular features of Solitaire:
- Single tap or drag and drop to move a card
- Undo feature
- Auto finish
- Unlimited free games
- Turn time, score, and moves
- And so much more!

Download now and see what you have been missing!
